channel.title: Treasure Adventure Game
channel.description:
Okay, so the guys at GoG are giving away the new game 'Treasure Adventure Game'. I'm currently about two hours into the game, and i am enjoying it as far as now. It's an adventure sidescroller, and it seems like there's a lot to this game.
Well, the link is here: [url]https://www.gog.com/en/gamecard/treasure_adventure_game[/url]
Just thought i would share this great game with you. And who doesn't like free games? :wink:
And what do you guys think of the game?

item.title: Treasure Adventure Game
item.dc:creator: djMDK
item.description:
Thank you. It worked and it is pretty fun n addicting.

Read full topic

item.title: Treasure Adventure Game
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness
item.description:
djMDK:

My game keeps crashing at the beginning where he sets sail off his adventure.

Happened to me too, then i opened the game as an administrator, then it worked just fine.

item.title: Treasure Adventure Game
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness
item.description:
I totally agree with you, this game is fucking awesome. I am like 6 hours into the game, and really enjoying it. It kind of reminds me of zelda, yet totally different.

Read full topic

item.title: Treasure Adventure Game
item.dc:creator: TheRatMan
item.description:
Thanks! the game’s actually quite awesome, I didn’t had a GoG account untill I saw this and didn’t know they’re giving away free stuff!

Now I just need to find some time to play it…

Read full topic
